And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H2601>Behold<s%>, Hanameel the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> your <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> my <S%H7704>field<s%> that is in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>: for the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H1353>redemption<s%> is your to buy <S%H7069>it<s%>.

And I <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanameel<s%> my <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, that was in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money<s%>, even <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying,

Now <S%H310>when<s%> I had <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>evidence<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> unto <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>, I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1419>Great<s%> in <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H5950>work<s%>: for your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H6491>open<s%> upon all the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>: to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings<s%>:

And have <S%H5414>given<s%> them this <S%H776>land<s%>, which you did <S%H7650>swear<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>them<s%>, a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>;

Behold the <S%H5550>mounts<s%>, they are <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H5892>it<s%>; and the city is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H6440>it<s%>, because of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and of the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and of the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>: and what you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is come to <S%H7200>pass<s%>; and, behold, you see it.

And you have <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord <S%H3069>God<s%>, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> you the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, and <S%H5749>take<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>; for the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H3068>Behold<s%>, I am the Lord, the <S%H430>God<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: is there any <S%H1697>thing<s%> too hard for <S%H6381>me<s%>?
